if (ENABLE_PREDICT)
  if (${PREDICTOR_IMPL} STREQUAL "torchscript")
    add_subdirectory(torchscript)
  elseif (${PREDICTOR_IMPL} STREQUAL "onnx")
    add_subdirectory(onnx)
  elseif (${PREDICTOR_IMPL} STREQUAL "llm_api")
    add_subdirectory(llm_api)
  else ()
    message(FATAL_ERROR "Unknown predictor implementation requested: `${PREDICTOR_IMPL}`! Set with `PREDICTOR_IMPL=<torchscript|onnx|llm_api>`.")
  endif ()
endif()
